summary: Air Atronachs now in Skyrim. Along with an artifact of a powerful Air Monarch.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#ff7700][size=5][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/915x260q90/r/674/7fvsHm.jpg[/img]
Description:[/size][/color][/font]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[font=Georgia]This mod adds a new Atronach type called "[u]Air Atronach[/u]".
These atronachs are based on the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Air_Atronach]ones from ESO[/url].
[u]It adds 2 new playable conjuration spells, 2 new staves for those spells, 2 new masks and a new enemy[/u].
Both spells will be more powerful if you have the [i]Elemental Potency perk[/i].

The spells and masks can be aquired from the 3 new bosses around Skyrim (Check the images to see locations).
These bosses are powerful and will be very hard to defeat with a low-level player.
Read the note they carry.
The masks are temperable.

The non-DLC version of the mod adds the staves to the bosses.
The other version - Dragonborn DLC version requires the main file (Non-DLC version), it won't work without.
The Dragonborn-DLC version removes the staves from the bosses b[size=2]ut allows for them to be created at the Staff Enchanter (if you know the spells).[/size][/font][font=Arial][size=2]
The Dragonborn-DLC version also changes the Air Atrona[/size]ch/Thrall/Monarch power to a cyclone.

VIDEO :
(Shows only the non-DLC version)
[youtube]GZlcBqo-q0w[/youtube]
[/font][font=Georgia][b]I know they don't look the same as the ones from ESO.
[/b][/font]
Other videos that show the mod:
[youtube]AwVDP-vNl8I[/youtube]  [youtube]MdrHD5Ax2jc[/youtube]
Thanks to DGC and Dptheslothking for them.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[color=Blue]Permissions:[/color]
Contact me if you'd like to use any assets from this mod.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[color=#0000ff]Incompatibilities:[/color]
None.
~~~~~~~~~~~~
